body_html: There are some important reasons for why many ops tie their int32 calculations to CPU (host-pinned) only. I cannot speak for scatter/gather, but my guess is this may have some very negative performance impact. Will assign to Xiaoqiang. He'll be back from leave in ~a week and should have final say.

I cannot speak for scatter/gather, but my guess is this may have some very negative performance impact.  Will assign to Xiaoqiang.  He'll be back from leave in ~a week and should have final say.
body: There are some important reasons for why many ops tie their int32 calculations to CPU (host-pinned) only.  I cannot speak for scatter/gather, but my guess is this may have some very negative performance impact.  Will assign to Xiaoqiang.  He'll be back from leave in ~a week and should have final say.
